response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet the highest standards and expectations. We believe in providing exceptional value to our customers, and this product is no exception. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its worth to be significantly above $800,000. Considering the high quality and the exclusive nature of this item, we are offering it to you at an extraordinary price of $950,000. This is a rare opportunity to acquire such a valuable asset at a premium rate, and we hope you will find it appealing. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product.", "product_price": 950000}
